trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control that can be used to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
The BackColorTransparent property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
For performance reasons, the BackColorTransparent property is turned off by default.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
For more information about the BindingContextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child*> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
Only one element can be hosted, but Child can have any number of child elements.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child*> property is set.
To be added.
Occurs when the control is clicked.
For more information about the Click event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*> property changes.
For more information about the ClientSizeChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a new control is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
For more information about the ControlAdded event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a control is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.
For more information about the ControlRemoved event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property changes.
For a more information about the CursorChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Gets the default size of the control.
For more information about the DefaultSize property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
Immediately frees any system resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control.
This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
For more information about the DoubleClick event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
For more information about the DragDrop event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
For more information about the DragEnter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
For more information about the DragLeave event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.
To be added.
Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
For more information about the DragOver event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Enables a <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Call the EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
The EnableModelessKeyboardInterop method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-based application.
The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
Occurs when the control is entered.
For more information about the Enter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the control has input focus.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*> property value changes.
For more information about the FontChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> property value changes.
For more information about the ForeColorChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.

Overrides the base class implementation <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize*> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements.
The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The computed by the control, given the constraints specified by proposedSize.
Occurs during a drag operation.
For more information about the GiveFeedback event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control receives focus.
For more information about the GotFocus event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
To access the parent of the hosted element, access HostContainer directly.
The parent container.
Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
The IME mode of the control.
Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
For more information about the Invalidated event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.

If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
The character to forward.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
For more information about the KeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
For more information about the KeyPress event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.
For more information about the KeyUp event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
For more information about the Layout event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
For more information about the Leave event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control loses focus.
For more information about the LostFocus event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
For more information about the MouseCaptureChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
For more information about the MouseClick event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
For more information about the MouseDoubleClick event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
For more information about the MouseDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
For more information about the MouseEnter event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
For more information about the MouseHover event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
For more information about the MouseLeave event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer is moved over the control.
For more information about the MouseMove event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
For more information about the MouseUp event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.
For more information about the MouseWheel event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnEnabledChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
The data for the event.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus"></xref> event.
For more information about the OnGotFocus method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated"></xref> event.
For more information about the OnHandleCreated method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event.
For more information about the OnLeave method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the OnPaint method forwards to the base class implementation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Paints the background of the control.
The OnPaintBackground method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the control to paint.
Renders the control using the provided <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Notifies the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap*> that a property has changed.
The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
The new value of the property.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
For more information about the OnVisibleChanged method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Occurs when the control's padding changes.
For more information about the PaddingChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control is redrawn.
The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
To be added.
Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
For more information about the PreviewKeyDown event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.

If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values representing the key to process.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] processing.

If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
The character to process.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap"></xref> that maps <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost"></xref> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
For more information about the QueryContinueDrag event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the control is resized.
For more information about the Resize event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
For more information about the RightToLeftChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] control.
The scaling factor for the x-axis.
The scaling factor for the y-axis.
Activates the hosted element.
The Select method activates the hosted element.
If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property value changes.
For more information about the SizeChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property value changes.
For more information about the TextChanged event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=fullName>.
To be added.
Processes Windows messages.
For more information about the WndProc method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A message to process.
